short.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: JRC Softphone is a WebRTC client for PBX.

long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G:
JRCPABX works using WebRTC & SIP protocol. It makes communication easy and cost-effective.

Key features of JRCPABX are:

-> Audio Calls
-> Video Calls
-> Conferencing
-> Call Hold
-> Call Transfer
-> Call Park
-> Mute/ Unmute
-> Call History
-> Phonebook
-> Extension Settings
-> Voicemail Play & Download
-> Fax Record
-> Instant Messaging (Chat)
